name: Review of approved construction drawings and specifications
All drawings and specifications approved and up to date
Site access cleared and made safe
All personnel inducted; safety briefings completed
Dust, noise, and sediment barriers installed and functioning
All utilities marked as per drawings
Part 2 – Set-out and excavation (photos where applicable)
Set-out verified and matches IFC drawings
Width, depth, and alignment match design drawings
Depth and width meet design specifications
No loose soil or collapses; protective measures in place if trench is over 1.5m
Compaction results meet project criteria. 1 test every 40 linear meters and 1 every two layers.
Part 4 – Fill material and compaction (photos where applicable)
Material complies with particle size, moisture content, MMDD
Levels and grading match design tolerances (+/-20mm)
Conformance Criteria Summary - Work area is clear, utilities and exclusion zones are clearly marked, permits are approved.
Conformance Criteria Summary - Approved excavation permit (GDP) prior to commencing works
Conformance Criteria Summary - Verify levels, site boundaries, and physical bounds per IFC drawings
Specification Reference - WBS-SS-PM- PLN-0024, WAE230103- 03-003 TM Rev0
Conformance Criteria Summary - Sediment control measures in place
Specification Reference - PP3 section 1.5 and section 4.1
Conformance Criteria Summary - Dust control measures in place
Conformance Criteria Summary - Material certificate and test report for particle size distribution, moisture content, MMDD
Conformance Criteria Summary - Geotechnical test results showing compliance
3.1 - Excavation to subgrade – verify lines, depth and dimensions
Conformance Criteria Summary - Compliance with design drawings and subgrade preparation
3.2 - Stockpiling of excavated material – manage and segregate by type
Conformance Criteria Summary - Material stockpiled appropriately, no cross contamination
Conformance Criteria Summary - Base is level, compacted, and free of debris; compaction meets project specs.
Conformance Criteria Summary - Backfill material compacted in 150mm layers to required thickness
○ Material shall be placed to a depth of 150mm above the collars of pipes or conduits, 300mm above pipes and 600mm above culverts
Conformance Criteria Summary - Compaction test report showing >92% MMDD every 40 linear meters and every 2 layers WBS-SS-CI-ITP-920049
Conformance Criteria Summary - Survey records and as-built drawings
4.1 - Finish level compliance with design drawings
